Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT iPAD 2
Reviews.Author: Beatrice
Reviews.Content: I bought this refurbished iPad 2 (32 GB, Wifi+AT&T; 3G for my husband's birthday because he won't leave mine alone. Mine is also a refurb but I I bought it at Apple online and spent about $700.00 for it compared to Rocket Jakes price of $399. A Genius at Apple told me he prefers refurbished products as any FACTORY quirks that existed are straightened out. The iPad was simple to set up. It was in original Apple packaging and works perfectly. The AT&T; Wi-fi was also easy to set up. AT&T; has lower data charges for iPads than Verizon but Verizon has a larger coverage area. Alas! Money is tight. I also got a Smart Magnetic Cover for Apple Ipad 2 cover at Amazon from CyprusTech for $7.74 compared to the $39 I spent for mine at Apple and it looks and acts exactly the same. I'm thrilled with this product so far but I set it up with my Apple ID and now I'm going to have to jump through some hoops to figure out how to get my husband his own Apple ID because iTunes is all set up on one computer with MY Apple ID ....h-h-m-m-m! Another tech challenge.

Reviews.Author: Just me
Reviews.Content: I was given an older version IPAD from my brother last year and really liked it but it only worked on Wi-Fi. I don't live in an area where Wi-Fi is always available so I was limited to using it at home. so a few months later when my 50th birthday was coming up, my husband asked what I would like. I told him the only thing I wanted was the IPad with wireless AND 3G. Of course he thought I was nuts since I had a perfectly good, working IPAd already. So naturally, I got my wish!  We ordered a refurbished one to save money. I have not been disappointed yet! I take it everywhere with me. I am impressed with the speed even when using 3G. I am able to use it at our cabin and streamed our High School basketball State Championship game with zero problems.  The only problem I have now is I own a 5 month old Laptop that I rarely use!

Reviews.Title: What to say that hasn't been said
Reviews.Author: Jahmez "I'm a nerd who wants to help"
Reviews.Content: Chances are, you know what an iPad is and know the positives of it. It is very user friendly, it has tons of apps, and they are all ran through Apple so they work very well. There are occasional crashes with streaming app, but it only closes the app and you can reopen it. This is the iPad 2, so, if you are expecting Siri... you will be disappointed. Siri is nice, but it isn't needed to love this product. The maps is still awful, but you can get Google maps and that is much better. Realistically, this is wonderful for people who do a lot of internet based surfing and want a phone experience but bigger. It is also great for family that is horrible with tech. If you are wondering, "Well, I'm a power user, is there anything for me?" Firstly, you should know how to look that up yourself. Secondly, yes! You can VPN into a laptop or desktop with many apps available in the app store to Virtualize your desktop from any wifi access point. Great buy and if money is a problem, the iPad 2 is now cheap enough to not be a big purchase.

If it was not so expensive I would have purchased at least two more, but the price keeps me from doing that.  I rate this device with an A+

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Envy
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product for everyone. The controls are simple enough for even my parents to understand (lol, I love them, but they're a little slow on the technological uptake), but the functions it provides and the apps that can be added are able to provide complex operations tailored to suit any need.The battery life is amazing. I can use it almost continuously for approximately twenty hours before I need to reuse it. Less if I'm using heavy graphics, etc. But even then it functions for around sixteen hours. It charges very quickly when turned off and plugged into the wall. The screen is very responsive, and the keyboard is not as difficult to use as I had feared (this is referring to the larger keyboard that appears when you turn the device side-ways. The smaller keyboard is more difficult, but not impossible). The only downside I see to the keyboard is that I can't select Spanish letters and accents. I hear that there may be a way to get them, but I haven't had success thus far.All in all, a wonderful device. I love it, and would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 64GB
Reviews.Author: Michele Carter
Reviews.Content: The iPad overall is very nice. It runs smoothly and having the extra storage space is great. The only negative thing I have to say is that the screen is not the best compared to the retina display on the newer iPads and iPhones, but that is perfectly fine because of the price.

Reviews.Title: I Apple
Reviews.Author: Michael W. Tyler "thx. M"
Reviews.Content: Why? Compare two things and you will know. Time and Living. If these two matter to you, then look at how convenient it is to use an Apple based appliance. Some say intuitive. I say easy. Basic. Bottom line - resourceful all the time. Time is what you save with Apple iPad 2, second generation. The core of Apple is it's safety, not programs that take up your memory and time, costly in cash and down town, called security programs. You know what I am talking about. Security for the designers and owners, but un-necessary with Apple.Easy to take-along with its weight-less characteristic, yet durable on the road in performance. Best buy for the iPad buck so far.iT InterestedMichael T

I was under the impression I was buying a new unit, not a used one

Reviews.Title: Got it for my birthday
Reviews.Author: Valerie St John
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the iPad 2.  It's been great to just pick up and check email without having to turn on the laptop and wait for it to boot.  Also great to pick it up and take a picture without having to get the camera out and load batteries, etc.  Love the apps too!

Reviews.Title: Great device, lives up to the hype
Reviews.Author: dobrin
Reviews.Content: I've had my iPad, which I bought used, since the end of April 2012.  I bought it to read articles (both academic PDF's and online fare via Instapaper) and play silly games, and it has exceeded my expectations on both counts.  I had used both a 7" and 10" Android tablet (modded Nook Color and gTablet, respectively) and a 4th generation iPod Touch in the past for pretty much the same purposes as with the iPad, and found myself not turning them on and subsequently selling them, so I was skeptical of how useful I'd find the iPad vs. a laptop or desktop.The advantage over the iPod Touch is just a matter of real estate.  The interfaces of the universal apps that I've used (ones that are available on both the iPod Touch and iPad) are much better on the iPad.  Not to knock Android, because I was admittedly using heavily modded versions of it and didn't have access to the entire Market (now Google Play, I guess), but there really are a ton of good apps available on the App Store.  There are good, efficient implementations of board games, silly puzzle games, a perfectly fine browser experience, good Dropbox, Instapaper, and Evernote apps; I could go on, but, really, there are just a ton of ways to use the iPad well.  I don't use it for much productivity (outside of Evernote and Dropbox), so I couldn't speak to that aspect.  But as a fun device that's useful to me, it's easy to recommend it to others.  If you want to spend the extra $100 for retina display, sure, go ahead and get the third generation one.  If you're struggling between the iPad 2 and other companies' tablets, though, I say go with the Apple.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: Nancy N. Gray "Lillie Bo"
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying the iPad. It was easy to set up and add apps. It is all I had hoped it would be.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: KrystalC
Reviews.Content: I recently made the decision to purchase an iPad. While deciding which to buy, I concluded that newer models (generations) are being made all the time and it is too hard to keep up. I ultimately chose the iPad 2 based on price.Pros:I was very impressed with how quickly my item arrived. I ordered it on a Thursday and was told I could expect it the following Wednesday-Friday. I received it the next Monday (4 days after ordering, including the weekend). In fact, i received the ipad prior to receiving the case. The packaging was great and there weren't any tears or major dents to the original box. The iPad was secure and protected.Cons: Some of the apps are not formatted for the larger screen of the iPad. For example, Instagram remains the size of a cell phone screen. There is an option to magnify the screen in the lower left hand corner, however the display becomes pixilated.Overall: I'm familiar with Apple products and am pleased with the product. It is easy to navigate and use. I am very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Ivory
Reviews.Content: The shippment is quick.The ipad is cool. And I am hunting for some interesting app to install.  Wish there is more free app there.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: It works just great.  I use it all the time.  I  was asked to review the product.  It would have been hard to do with iPhone

Reviews.Title: A Fun and Convenient Tablet
Reviews.Author: The Life & Times of a Book Addict
Reviews.Content: At first, I thought the idea of having an iPad was silly, until my friend was telling me of the benefits of having one. I debated and after some time I got the iPad 2. Now I love it. I take it with me everywhere I go. To school, work, etc.. I use it to write, watch movies, check email, music, and the occasional games. The main thing I use it for is to read e-books. I like that I can have a Kindle app, a Kobo app, and a Nook app all in one place without having to have several different e-readers. I like to get certain books on certain apps, especially if the price for a book is more affordable than another. Having an iPad just makes things a little more convenient. I love it.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: baltierm
Reviews.Content: I love love Love my new iPad. I bought it mostly for work, but I am on it all the time time.

Reviews.Title: Works Good as per my expectation
Reviews.Author: AmazonShopper
Reviews.Content: this iPad 2 came almost like new, works good. Solves my purpose. performance of ipad 2 is excellent for a normal user, until unless u are using it for High end games or memory sucking apps.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Ruthie
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying my ipad very much.  I have no complaints about it and love being able to place on my kitchen counter and follow recepies.  It is very handy being able to carry it with me.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: Mr. Floyd M. Heafner
Reviews.Content: Being new to the MAC world, learning the IPad operation has been a challenge but one worth undertaking. So far I am very impressed with this unit and still learning it's capabilities. I tried another tablet last year and the connection speeds and operation was so frustrating that I returned it immediately. The Ipad 2 is very efficient even though I have to go to several different places to learn it's operation i,e, Itunes then ICloud, next Ibooks and Safari and much more to come I am sure.

Reviews.Title: Happy!
Reviews.Author: Jaz
Reviews.Content: I am soon happy with my wonderful new iPad! Love that it came with a screen protector because the same day I received it my daughter scratched up my screen and I peel the protector off to check and make sure it was good and thank god it was!! I give my product and shipping time  10 stars.lol

Reviews.Title: Great iPurchase
Reviews.Author: M. Lavallee
Reviews.Content: The two iPads ordered arrived in perfect condition. The purchased items were clearly identified as AT&T; during the order process, but I required the Verizon provider. Items were given an RMA and return label within 30 seconds of my call. This is the best customer service I've ever dealt with.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Tom at 3R
Reviews.Content: Although this was a rebuilt unit, it worked perfectly, showed no signs of wear and was easy to set-up.The iPad has met my expectations in every way.

Reviews.Title: iPad2

I have played a TON of games on this but I have also done a lot of school and job related work on this device. For basic users this can completely replace a laptop altogether. There are so many apps there must be something that exist for your needs.

Just wanted a light tablet!!.the main problem which is not a secret to anyone at this moment is that it is very restricted to the use of the famous(infamous) itunes.the only way  to copy my tons of bookmarks was on safari and with the help of an expert. the only movie format that reads is mp4,and nothing ,pictures,files,videos,nothing can be organized on the tablet itself. It has to be done in the computer,and then moved to the ipad. In my humble opinion apple has never been friendly,or easy to use,and its full of restrictions but WHO CARES,its an apple, its magnificent!

Reviews.Title: Very easy to use, looks great, feels great

Reviews.Content: Purchased for my wife that hates technology..She's using it, every day found a new appl:Easy, comfortable to move, high definition screen (do yo NEED more??)

Reviews.Title: IPad lover
Reviews.Author: Torah

Reviews.Title: good

Reviews.Content: it is ok, excpet that too expensive for those software. I should learn to pay for the price of IP. HAHA!

Reviews.Title: IN LOVE WITH MY IPAD(:

Reviews.Content: This is absolutely amazing, I was skeptical buying online but no problem. It was packaged up amazingly, so no problem at all, defenately the best investment I made into my low vision inventory(:

Reviews.Title: Best purchase from amazon!

Reviews.Content: I received my iPad a couple days ago and absolutely love it! It actually came a week earlier than the estimated delivery date which I was surprised because I was not expecting it yet. I had been doing my research on the tablets and the iPad but finally ended up choosing the iPad and It was definitely the right choice ,and the battery life is a lot better than I thought a full charge can last me about 2-3 days upto 4 depending how much I use it.

Reviews.Title: Great Service - Wrong Color
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I appreciate the fact that mistakes are sometimes made, but to order a black IPad Tablet and have white one arrive makes one wonder how well the quality control system works.  The distributor provided a smart cover to atone for the mistake.  That was appreciated, but cannot dispel the disappointment in receiving the wrong product.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: grivladish
Reviews.Content: That was my best buy in 2012. Good product, great service. This is the way to go! I am really enjoy my new toy.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: MIGUELANGEL
Reviews.Content: Mi esposa esta encantada con el producto ella es medico y la gran variedad de aplicaciones para medicina son excelentes, le esta sacando el máximo provecho 100% recomendado

Reviews.Title: Fantastic product!
Reviews.Author: GailB
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband and he loves it! He searches the internet with it, reads, watches tutorials on his various tools when he is out in his shop. The size is perfect, he can read on it easier then on the Kindle Fire because the screen is larger. We both have one now and are very happy with our IPads, we are in our late 60"s and it was easy to learn how to use. When the grandkids are over they like to play games on them too, inexpensive entertainment. One more thing, we downloaded a GPS app which is very helpful when we travel, skype for the kids that are out of state, and Words With Friends, helps keep us sharp :)

Reviews.Title: Nice-- multimedia lacking document/storage
Reviews.Author: Tricia Weaver
Reviews.Content: This is an ideal item for the business Mom--Work:* Great for checking email- Microsoft docs you will have to download app for attachments.  Also Adobe files are no accessible either since Bill and Steve didn't get along.* Webcasts/conference calls* Linkedin, etc* Love how small it is.Mom engineering:1. Great for Movies/games apps  for the little ones2. Fb3. Exercise videos when on the runNegatives:After downloading 2 Disney Movies and one exercise video I am being told I don't have enough storage on iCloud.  Of course, I am sure I Cloud is willing to sell me additional space.  LOL

Reviews.Title: Would give it more stars if I could
Reviews.Author: Tanya Buys "Teacher"
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad. It is so easy to use and so useful. I bought the one without the cellular data ability. I didn't want to have to pay for a data plan and saved money on the cost of the iPad. That was the right choice for me. I use it all over the place with free wi fi spots so widely available. There are so many apps available that you can customize it for your needs very easily. This almost replaces my laptop computer. I hardly ever turn on the laptop anymore. The iPad runs faster than my laptop on most things online. I bought my iPad after falling in love with the one that I was issued for use in my special education class. I have been totally amazed at the things that I have seen happening in my classroom with the iPad. Any teacher, homeschoolers, or parent should have at least one iPad strictly for the kids. They are great learning tools with so many educational apps available--most free or low cost. And if you have a special needs child or student, then you doubly need an iPad for their use. It is much easier to use than a conventional computer for special needs children. And if you have a child with any disability on the Autism spectrum than you absolutely, without a doubt MUST have an iPad for your child. There are hundreds of apps designed just for people with Autism. If for no other reason than to use as an augmented communication system device, you must get this for your child with Autism.If I am asked to name one flaw with the iPad, it is that it cannot be cleaned. The screen gets lots of finger prints and gunk on it--especially with children using it. And it will get scratches on the screen, no matter how careful you are. If using it in a classroom with lots of children it can be a germ breeding ground since you cannot wipe it down with disinfectant. At school, we stick them inside gallon zip close storage bags as a good protective covering that can be thrown out and replaced cheaply. Screen protectors are a must have accessory.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Greg Hines "Hines, MD"
Reviews.Content: I have had a couple of iPhones, and now this iPad.  I like it, mostly because the same apps for my phone are on it.  I did not get the cellular package, as I use it mainly at home and at hot spots, but so far, I have liked it.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Monkeys1124
Reviews.Content: I already had an ipad 2 and i knew my older brother wanted one, so i got him this one and he loved it. It's small and smooth, very well done.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: iPad was just as they said. Looks new and works great, no problems what so ever and best yet still under apple care like they said.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: David Bowlin
Reviews.Content: Very quick and very sturdy feeling. The battery seems to last all day too. And tons of apps to use and play with.

Reviews.Title: Great good looking tablet!!

Reviews.Content: This is an incredible and a great good looking tablet, almost a laptop because you can all you want with it, i recommend it and i will buy again from this seller

Reviews.Content: I love the ipad for my personal use.  I bought it to test for business use, but found few applications that apply to my business. So now it is my personal device.  Great for photos, music, ibooks, etc.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 3G wi-fi AT&T;

Reviews.Content: I received my iPad 2 in great new condition. It was delivered in prompt time. It works great!! I even purchased an outer box for it to completely protect my iPad.

Reviews.Title: Love the Ipad
Reviews.Author: Linda Floyd "lff"
Reviews.Content: This Ipad was in much better condition than the product description. It said light scratches on the back well, there were very few and hardly noticeable.  Ipad was in great condition. Fast shipping. I would recommend this seller to my friends and I would def to business with the seller again. Thank You for the Ipad.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: Jenn Stacy
Reviews.Content: I have been waiting along time to get myself one of these.  I guess the waiting paid off because I finally got it. You can do some much with an Ipad, it's endless. It's amazing just like Amazon is.  I order from here alot, and I will continue to do so.

Reviews.Title: iPad

Reviews.Content: Great tablet plenty of gigabyte space.  Easily handable.  I would reccommend this product to everyone I knew because it is like a pc and does everything the same as a pc, but at a cheaper price...

Reviews.Title: Simply Awesome!
Reviews.Author: T. Noble
Reviews.Content: This is my first experience with an iPad2 and I have to say I LOVE it! I tried to buy one from the Apple site but they no longer offer the 64 GB model. The seller shipped quickly and everything was as listed. There is so much to learn and so much one can do with this product. I am looking forward to using it!

Reviews.Title: Ipad2
Reviews.Author: Betty
Reviews.Content: I bought the Ipad as a graduation gift for my granddaughter. So far I am very pleased with it. It arrived on time and in great condition. It is being used more than I had imagined it would be! She has had absolutely no problems at all. She will be starting college and probably get great use out of it.

Reviews.Title: I love them iPad
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: The iPad is great and functions perfectly. I opted to get the 2nd generation with 3G and 64 gb  unit and have I activated the 3G which works good. After a little confusion regarding the shipping timeline, the seller upgraded the services to meet the expectations at no additional cost. One thing to keep in mind though is that the delivery requires a signature at delivery so for a residential delivery may get delayed if no one is home.

Reviews.Title: Love my new iPad!!!
Reviews.Author: Circuschica
Reviews.Content: I was a bit skeptical to order from a new merchant with no ratings but I'm very happy I did.  I got an iPad at a great price and thought it was to good to be true but it was true.  I expected it to arrive next week but I got in 4 days sooner and was pleasantly surprise and very happy.  I will definitely buy from her again confident I'll get the same super fast deliver and quick response.

} } } Length:: 0:42 MinsThe iPad 2 was a great device. Nevertheless, the release of the New iPad brings forth a new question: Should you buy the now cheaper iPad 2?There are many factors to be considered when making this purchase. The main upgrades of the New iPad include retina display, faster processor, better cameras, and with iOS 6, siri. My family owns both the iPad 2 and the New iPad. Apple did not change the iPad much between these two generations. It kept the same battery life, the same thickness (almost), and the same design. Thus, it is a personal decision.The devices are very similar, and most of the cons of the iPad 2 are fixed in the New iPad. However, is the upgrade worth $100-150?Cons of iPad 2 and how the New iPad uses them:Lack of Retina Display: When the iPad 2 was released, retina display had already been seen in other apple devices, like the iPod touch 4th generation. The general public was disappointed by the lack of this feature in the iPad 2. The iPad 3 had this feature. However, I don't really notice the difference. They both appear to have excellent displays. The New iPad's improved display can only be identified in rare conditions, such as viewing upgraded apps or sharp photos. Overall, the retina display in the iPad increases the memory many apps in the app store take up. For example, many iPad 2 users posted bad reviews about Monopoly HD when they had an update that increased the memory that app took up extensively. The update of Monopoly HD did not bring any new features besides Retina display. iPad 2 users were angry because now they lost memory without any benefits.Lack of better Cameras: The iPad 2's cameras are terrible. They back facing camera is .7 megapixels. On a smaller screen this would be acceptable because it is still HD, but on a 10 in. screen photos shot by the iPad camera look pixelated. The New iPad is said to have 5 megapixel cameras. Even so, the cameras on the New iPad aren't that great. Look at the video I posted so you can see the difference yourself. The video is best viewed in full screen.Faster Processor: The iPad 2 has a decent processor and is capable of doing everything you can currently do on an iPad decently. The iPad 3 is faster, especially when loading apps. The upgrade is great but not necessary.Siri: With iOS 6, the New iPad will have exclusive new abilities like Siri. Although many are not appreciative of siri after seeing it on the iPhone, the fact that the New iPad will now have it suggests that apple will continue to do this. Apple's newest products will continue to receive features that older products won't have through updates. Thus, it may be a good idea to purchase the New iPad as another one is not expected soon.

Reviews.Title: iPad is like no other tablet on the market!
Reviews.Author: Granna
Reviews.Content: Apple's reputation for quality is unsurpassed in thier tablet.  Very intuitive and easy to use.  I was able to touch type on the screen without putting on my reading glasses ..... a real plus for anyone who did not grow up in the texting age and like most of us over 50 need reading glasses.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2
Reviews.Author: keti
Reviews.Content: It is a very good tablet.I like it and I am happy with it. It fits all m requirements and is exactly what i was expecting.thank you

Reviews.Title: I-Pad 2
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey
Reviews.Content: Not a scratch on it. It works perfect. The box also looked new, and everything was in the box instruction and all literature that comes with a new I-Pad.What a great vendor. Thanks for the great deal ! I will buy from this vendor again.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: The iPad runs great! I had been wanting one for a while and it was great to find one at such a good price that runs like it is brand new. I am actually writing this very review on it now. It works marvelously and am glad that I made the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Love My ipad
Reviews.Author: Lynda
Reviews.Content: Love the ipad 2.  This is my first ipad and it goes everywhere with me.  I wouldn't be without it.  Plan on buying one for my husband for Christmas this year.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't live without it
Reviews.Author: Cass
Reviews.Content: You can't buy a 64 gig IPad2 in stores anymore. Amazon had it for a good $100 less. The 2 doesn't have as good camera resolution as three, but that's what I use my IPhone for. And with Cloud all of the pics come to my IPad, then I do all of my photo editing. It has virtually replaced my laptop!

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY IPAD!
Reviews.Author: Majo
Reviews.Content: I love my IPAD, truly the world is closer now, I use and share it with my 6 year old daughter!!! She loves it too!! best of the best, this is my first Apple item and I can't believe os always on!! you don't have to wait untill anything boots! love it love it love it!

Reviews.Title: I=PAD 2
Reviews.Author: MaryC
Reviews.Content: So far, so good. I bought it 'like new' for $30 cheaper than a new I-Pad. Came quickly and so far product working fine.

Reviews.Title: BEST BUY  for a 64 gig ipad tablet!!!!
Reviews.Author: David A. Clark
Reviews.Content: I ordered the tablet with reservations not normally purchasing "like new" and not "brand new" but the difference of over 200 dollars and the fact that amazon warehouse 30 day quarantee I took the chance and glad I did.The tablet arrived less that 24 hours after I ordered with free shipping. It was in the original box , serial number on the box matched the tablet, shrinked wrapped with no outside damage.The tablet was "NEW" never used and had all the parts listed in the box.Have been using it for only 24 hours and it is great!!!!If you want the ipad 2 with 64 gig disk space at the 16 gig new price RUN don't walk and order you a tablet from amazon warehouse.

Reviews.Title: Huge fan of apple stuff
Reviews.Author: Smile Savvy
Reviews.Content: I bought this ipad for my friend and as always apple gadgets are good stuff to have. Got one myself.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Product was better than i thought it would be. Perfect condition and great shipping speed. its a gift for my sister and she will love it thank you

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 2
Reviews.Author: frances alfaro
Reviews.Content: I was very happy when i get my ipad 2 is the best of the best the only thing is the bad quality camera i dont know why such a expensive and revolutionary product from Apple has this bad quality cameras i get very dissapointed with this detail...!!! I compare this iPad 2 with my Asus Eee Pad slider  SL101 camera and the pictures are fantastic offcourse it has a 5mp so think abouted....

Reviews.Title: Glad i bought an ipad

You can listen to music through it but it is so bulky I don't see how you are supposed to do so in comfort. It would have to be sitting next to you and you can't really carry it around and do stuff. If you want to listen to music get an ipod. The ipad is also very durible. I have dropped it many times and nothing is wrong with it. Thank you for taking your time to read this and I hope it helped you.

Reviews.Title: Nice toy for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My six year old is addicted to it.  I don't know whether that's good or bad.  Most of the time she watches netflix but other times she reads childrens books and plays casual games.  I hardly use it other than while I lie down on my bed (with laptop, you can't do that facing up).  It was a gift from her grandmom.  If I had to buy a tablet for her, I wouldn't buy ipad because other android tablets do them fine with lesser price.  She hardly plays her Nintendo DS anymore.  Maybe Nintendo should make a tablet.  It's fast and has no lag, rarely has problems (one time I had to do factory restore because it wouldn't download/update apps anymore, very strange).  I hope it last 10 years.  I know apple wouldn't do it for minimalist reasons but I wished they would include usb ports, microsd slot, and HDMI.  These and being able to view Flash are the reasons why I'd opt for Toshiba Thrive if I had to buy a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Gaurav
Reviews.Content: I took a long time deciding which tablet to buy and had narrowed down to Motorola Xoom, Sony Tablet S and iPad 2. I tried out all 3 and a few more tablets before choosing the iPad 2. I bought the iPad because-1. Navigation was smooth with the iPad. With all other tablets, I noticed that the tablet would not react to the touch every once in a while.2. The tablet is for my wife. iOS is much more intuitive than Android when it comes to tablets. the complexity of use of Android is fine for techies, though.3. Assurance of OS upgrade. I know that my iPad 2 would be compatible with future versions of iOS and that Apple would allow free upgrades. At the time of my purchase, I wasn't so sure about Android based tablets (looking at how many Android based cellphones dont get timely OS upgrades)4. Flaws in other tablets. Every other tablet has flaws, which is pretty disappointing. Xoom is good, but they dont deliver what they promise (Read up on Xoom users' agony over the micro SD unusability for over 6 months). Sony tablet doesn't come with 3G.Reasons why I took so long before buying the iPad:1. Dependence on iTunes2. No SD input3. Heavy price of accessories (like the one for connecting iPad to a TV)But in the end, it was worth it. Now I rarely open my PC; I just find it too bulky and slow now. :)

Reviews.Title: Loads of Fun
Reviews.Author: A. J. Herring "Daemon"
Reviews.Content: I won't hash out the technical specs and details like other reviewers have probably done a few times before me.I love my iPad 2. My girlfriend just got me one for our anniversary. Funny thing is she just got one from her mom for Christmas at my suggestion. So now we both have one.She just recently got wifi at work, too. She takes hers to work. She tends to call me about 3-4 times a day (at least it feels like that) and now she can call me on her iPad using Facetime, so she can see me as well. I don't really know how I feel about that feature sometimes, but it's pretty cool. I have other friends with iPads and iPhones and stuff, so we can all Facetime just like a house phone. It takes a little more effort to use it (just like Skype), but it's a really cool native app to the iPad. The camera quality is a bit to be desired. I think my Mac has a better camera than the iPad.Anyway, I'm not giving a review of Facetime. The iPad 2 is fast. The screen is pretty large compared to my iPod touch and my Droid X. It works well as a reader. The games work well on it. I've even used it as a drawing tablet a few times. I would link a photo I've drawn in my review, but I'm not sure I can do that.The browser works just as well as it does on my Mac and my iPod touch. It's not the best thing in the world, but it works well.Mail is still a problem for me. I can't get my Yahoo to work and I can't actually divulge why. I know the reason why and I'm not willing to fix it because it could be a slight security risk. Gmail works fine for me. I can't get my work e-mail to work either, but I haven't messed with it enough to really determine the reason just yet.The iPads are great to have around to watch Netflix and things like that. Especially when there is a toddler that wants to watch something and everyone else is watching something on the big screen.Finally, the iPads are very expensive. So far my experience with Apple in the past few years is that they build a quality product and it tends to be worth it. I hope they continue this trend. I can't say whether or not it was worth the cost as I didn't shell out the money this time. I can only say that I'm enjoying the product and I'm very happy to have it.

Reviews.Title: Good deal, love mine
Reviews.Author: summer gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Really love mine, easy to use and great apps, this is my first apple product. Was scared I would not like it. But overall not bad

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad
Reviews.Author: Donna Boulier
Reviews.Content: Gave this to our son for Christmas. So far, he seems to be very happy with it. Used it during his whole visit! So, we're happy that he's happy, lol.Now he is looking for a good keyboard, any suggestions?

Reviews.Title: Fun but not a laptop replacement
Reviews.Author: G. Little "Billium1953"
Reviews.Content: The iPad is a wondeful fun device great for casual web browsing and such.  The interface is typical Apple excellence and the quality of the device seems quite good.It most certainly is not a laptop replacement.  Two absolute killers are that you cannot run MS Office and printing anything is pretty much a joke.  Yes, there are applications that sort of kind of read and write Office files but they are very limited.  Printing can also be done as long as you get an application, save this way and that, stand on your head and hope for the best.  Again, it is fun and cool as all get-out but not a business machine.

Holding the iPad for the first time is a great feeling, and the whole structure of this amazing product. It is truly the best tablet. Reviews.Title: The IPAD 2 is a work of art!!!
Reviews.Author: johnnyb
Reviews.Content: OK. Here it is. The IPAD 2 that came to the house via UPS was in a little box. Who knew that something so powerful would come in a non-descript brown box. I was tracking the travels and travails of my IPAD through the supplied tracker (I am grateful for this feature) and was literally waiting for the UPS guy to show, times are either 10:00AM or 3:00PM missed the ten AM. Guess what..... Was waiting at the front door at 3; UPS showed up and so did my IPAD. Opened the box up, stiffened my resolve to not mess around until the IPAD was fully charged. So hooked the IPAD up, and waited for a full 24 hours. AFTER that, configured the machine to the wireless internet and then commenced to download EVERYTHING. The IPAD is COOL. It goes EVERYWHERE and can do practically everything. And the really weird part about this whole thing is this....my daughter, who is 4, put a claim on MY IPAD?????? Uhhh...NO. The answer is GET YOUR OWN. Too funny; For real, we share. But she did put a claim on the IPAD. All right, 5 stars, the seller gets a thumbs up as well for making sure that the delivery parcel was NON-DESCRIPT and no other verbiage was on the box either to state what was in inside either - once again the seller get a thumbs on that. Anyways, Enthusiastic about how the purchase went down, the delivery and tracking as well the product itself.

Reviews.Author: de1293
Reviews.Content: Received the Apple iPad2 in excellent shape and within the time frame expected. The iPad2 worked out of the box and is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: A beautiful, fun toy hampered by the Apple ecosystem
Reviews.Author: Amadeuz
Reviews.Content: As a matter of full disclosure, I am normally a Windows OS and Android user. I won my iPad 2 as a holiday party prize from my workplace. Also, I do not own an Android tablet (yet). To avoid being labeled as a Fandroid, I will list what I liked about the iPad first (yes, there are things that Apple does well):- the hardware design is indeed well thought out: thin, light, and nice to look at- construction and quality appear to be top notch- the screen display is sharp and bright- iOS for all of its shortcoming runs very smoothly on this device- tons of apps in the App store- insane battery life -> This thing has the best battery life of any backlit display device I've ever used. It probably can go 4-5 days between chargings with average web usage.- instant on -> best thing about a tablet in general: instant web browsing- the perfect device for consuming media (Web browsing, videos, games) in bedNow, on to what I didn't like:- I have to use iTunes -> First thing that the tablet signaled for me to do was plug it in to the computer and install iTunes- no back button- Safari sucks -> First thing I downloaded from the app store was Dolphin HD- no expandable storage (well known)- no Flash -> sure Adobe has decided to stop supporting this for mobile devices, but for the moment there are still plenty of sites which use it. I was surprised by how many sites to which I can't view content. For a device which purports to be great at Web browsing, this kinda sucks.- limited customization of iOS - it's a tray of icons and that's it. Barely can be called an OS.Although I hate that the iPad doesn't have expandable storage, USB ports, etc, that is the Apple way. It always has been. The Apple ecosystem is very closed and restrictive. I am positive the iPad 3 won't have any USB ports on it either. However, the main reasons why I'm only giving this device 4 stars are: iTunes, iOS and the lack of Flash. For the amount people pay for this thing, you should be able to access 100% of the sites out there. All this being said, and it pains me to say it, Apple still has no equal in producing a sexy piece of high quality hardware. Disregarding specs (i.e. processor speed, RAM) the iPad 2 is still the benchmark hardware for tablets. Just think if this thing had flash, a USB port and you didn't need iTunes to access it from your computer. Now that would be something.One additional comment on tablet devices in general. Nobody NEEDS one of these things. They are, in my opinion, the ultimate in media consumption (videos, e-books, games, browsing, social networking) which is the opposite of productivity. Seriously, the main reason I wanted one was so I didn't have to wait the 120 seconds it takes to boot up my laptop to browse the Web. And also so I could browse literally anywhere in my house. Definitely, these are wants and not needs. Just a thought.

Reviews.Content: Cool thing, before I used just the ipod, but one is aging and your eyes need larger image. I'm very happy. I can only recommend.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!
Reviews.Author: Snick "Snick"
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad.  It's easy to read, not too big and it goes everywhere with me.  I'm glad I bought it.  It holds a charge well also.  Once you have charged the iPad, that charge will last for more than a day or two (depending how much you read).  I plug mine in every night before bed and it's ready the next morning.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Meshari
Reviews.Content: I bought this device a month ago, and so far I find no problem using it.Honestly, I prefer the galaxy tap. I used them both. Samsung apps are better, cheaper and more plentiful.I give it five stars because the shipping was so fast.I love it.

Reviews.Title: I Am Loving My New Toy
Reviews.Author: BrotherSpider "Spider"
Reviews.Content: i fought long and hard about it and then realized that i was spending as much money on Blu Ray as i would getting this thing. ok, so Netflix streaming isn't going to replace Blu Ray any time soon, but now i have another option.I just spent 2.5 hours in dialysis streaming ST:DS8 and it hardly put a dent in my power. that battery will last a LONG tmepicture quality is good, but i recomend an anti glare screen to go on it too.this is a cool gizmo and i love those angry birds

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: NYRJessica
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best "gadgets" I have ever purchased. It's mobile, versatile, and easy to use.  Wild have given 5 stars if it had a better camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Service
Reviews.Author: kristina holt
Reviews.Content: Great Response and Excellent Customer Service very pleased with my ipad2 if you ever have any questions always contact Bob he is a great and very quick and responsive manager couldnt be more pleased

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Adam B. Shaeffer "ashaef"
Reviews.Content: After nearly 6 months of everyday use, I love this device. It still isn't a full-fledged replacement for a computer, but it's close. iOS 5 is a great step toward that kind of functionality and further improves a product I already loved. I use it for classes, entertainment, work, and as an interactive toy for my 2 year-old son. He LOVES the Sandra Boynton apps and is confused by the physical book versions since the characters don't move like they do on the iPad 2.This was a great purchase for me and my family that we will enjoy for years to come.

Reviews.Title: So much more than I hoped for!
Reviews.Author: Mom of 6 "Jess"
Reviews.Content: I did my homework & spent months comparing tablets & laptops against the iPad2. Due to life taking it's own twist s & turns I was going to have to put off my purchase until next year. My boy friend bought me a poleroid e-reader 2 weeks ago to get me out of the living room after he went to sleep for the reading light as I'm addicted to everything Terry Prachet. Needless to say, while I was happy to be in our bedroom the e-reader is very limited in it's format & unless you know what your reading by heart your going to get lost thanks to missing text. Of course I am very thankful that he wanted to be generous & tried to be helpful but he knew I was unimpressed. So two days ago I was woken up to close my eyes & hold out my hands. He bought me the iPad2! The camera's are awesome, the size is twice as big yet the same weight as the e-reader. The already installed apps are great & navigating app store is so easy, let alone almost every site online that I have been to so far (20 of my favorite online news, shopping, weather etc.) already has a free app for the iPad2. There are a few interesting quirks though...1) You must have a pc to install the operating system through I tunes, but you can also go to an Apple store & they will help you.2) While it comes already installed with a YouTube app the videos aren't the best versions (due to their FLASH) but you do get the site, with most videos & songs.3) Apple IPad2 is not compatible with adobe FLASH... Not on the apps or if you just use the safari operating system to connect to the browser of your choice.4) No more zynga games, (Mafia Wars etc.) on Facebook if this will be your only mode of internet connection.5) The apps pages are in most cases very cool & graphically stimulating, however I am learning going to the same site using safari will have different content. In the case of Facebook, I couldn't view the links posted by my friends to my wall when using the Facebook app.6) The yahoo messenger app takes up the entire iPad screen & I tended to forget it was signed on to learn I was missing conversations due to web browsing... or sitting around waiting for a response.The iPad has made the last 2 days of after dinner family movies more tolerable, as the toddlers can watch their Disney movies. While I enjoy Netflix on the couch, they sung & danced to their hearts desires without me getting frustrated that I can't see Eric & Arial get thrown out of the boat for the 5 billionth time. Bed time has been fun for us all, as they are amazed I read them a color book (The little engine that could... Free in I-books) up in thier bedroom on my, "tiny nooooooo touchy TV".I LOVE MY IPAD2!!!! None of the aforementioned quirks are irritating enough to walk away, just things I don't know enough about or need to get used to. Considering the auto spell hasn't inspired me t9, I mean *59... ugh! Hasn't made me throw it out the window yet. But I can turn it off in the settings, which is a really cool feature with all kinds of settings & features I haven't fully jumped into yet.  You can buy the 500gb wifi external hard drive to store your movies & video's on, (as it's not expandable) plus share ability with up to 2 or 3 others, at the same time. So really it's only draw back is the whole Adobe Flash issue or I would think it is absolutely perfect!I knowI will go back to using my laptop from time to time, but right now I am so excited & inspired to find all the ways I can enjoy & use this clever machine it's going to be a while.

Reviews.Title: IPad 2
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Mcguffin
Reviews.Content: I have been VERY pleased with my purchase!  It came very promptly in the condition as promised and I have hardly put it down since I received it!

Reviews.Title: iPad2
Reviews.Author: sepp6424
Reviews.Content: For someone who is technically challenged, it would be helpful to have a couple of pages of basic "how-to" instructions. Despite all the hoopla about it being intuitive, I doubt that my wife could have gotten to first base if I had not set up some basic icon shortcuts to sites that I knew she would use. And how does a novice get past their first encounter with a gray screen? That said, it's a pretty slick machine. NOTE: It does not support Flash, so a lot of stuff will pass you by. (Third-party developers claim to have an app that solves this...the verdict appears to still be out on its effectiveness)

Reviews.Title: ipad2
Reviews.Author: Martin Levy
Reviews.Content: This is like having a computer in your grasp every moment you require one.  Outstanding speed and clarity.  The learning curve is gentle but every day you learn more.

Reviews.Title: My IPad2
Reviews.Author: Jorge Castrello
Reviews.Content: Is lovely device that resolve my tasks anywhereI' like so muchIt's a very worth inversion to be update

Reviews.Title: good service on a great product!
Reviews.Author: Gregory Kuntz "gregoryk"
Reviews.Content: I am happy with my new iPad, arrived on time but poorly packed, rattling around in a big box unsecured with padding.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Mario Segura Herrera "Mario Segura"
Reviews.Content: Excellent product as always with Apple, I love my iPad, easy to use, hundred of useful applications can be installed, elegant design, amazing display and incredible performance!

Reviews.Title: Fun with my iPad
Reviews.Author: Birgit Ladet
Reviews.Content: My iPad is really fun to work with, the only problem I had was that I had downloaded NOOK ebooks while I was in the US, but forgot to download the link that enables me to read them. As I live in Europe, I can't download that link. Also I find that there are certain apps that don't work in Europe.

Reviews.Title: ipad2
Reviews.Author: Annette
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Ipad2 for my daughter's birthday she is in love with it, she is starting college on Sept and that was the idea. There are so many things she can do with it. The purchase was smooth and the delivery was perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Kathy Conklin
Reviews.Content: No complaints here! My iPad was delivered quickly and in perfect condition. Although I did have to reset it to get the iPad to sync to my PC iTunes, I have had no difficulties since.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad2
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: Wonderful piece of electronics equipment.  Worked right out of the box, which arrived on time and in perfect condition.  I've installed several apps, and they all work!  I just installed the Skype app for the iPad2, and that works just fine, and I Skype with my children.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT! much more than the first gen
Reviews.Author: peatreat
Reviews.Content: i may be biased since i like most of the products that apple produces but i really like my ipad 2.  Its thin design, and ability to play things like hulu, netflix, mlbtv and more along with apps that let me stream videos from my HUGE desktop computer to my ipad are great!

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: Camilo
Reviews.Content: Using this devices It's really simple, fast and exciting, thats why searching the web, listening to music, reading papers and others make the ipad fantastic for it. Apps are extremelly cool, I completly recommend it

Reviews.Title: iPad2
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I really like the iPad 2, but it doesn't play some video formats like other pads out there.I do wish that I bought the iPad 2 with Wi-Fi + 3G.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a device to surf the internet, and to use it for my work. It is an excelent choice to show videos,pictures, etc.It has also a lot of other nice things, but I think another reviewers have said it all.

Reviews.Title: The iPad2 is a game-changer.
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey E Ellis
Reviews.Content: There is little left to say about the iPad2; especially technical evaluations from wiser heads.I can say this is extremely fast and the screen is brilliant, vivid and bright. The size and speed of this unit are truly remarkable. It outperforms every laptop I have used from HP, Dell, Sony, and Panasonic. Given the apps for the iPad2, it appears that most office functions are becoming available for Apple. As soon as my company IT group can support it, I will happily carry the iPad2 for work travel.

Reviews.Title: iPad2 is great
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: I love the iPad2.  It provides many hours of enjoyment.  The battery lasts longer than predicted, which is a nice plus.  I was able to set it up initially with very little problem.  The sound provided is much crisper than I expected.

Reviews.Title: Worth the Wait
Reviews.Author: LGL
Reviews.Content: Except for my iPod - probably my favorite device of all time - I'd never had an Apple product before now, and I really like the 32GB, Wifi iPad2. It does exactly what's claimed for it and more. It's lightweight, easy to handle, and easy to use. As for the smart cover, it's probably the best product innovation in several years by any device maker. The access to the large and rapidly increasing # of apps, of course, puts it in a class far removed from everything else in its category. I like it so much, in fact, that when my Dell laptop died a couple of weeks ago, I bought a MacBook, that - so far at least - seems equally intuitive and pleasant to use.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Vishal
Reviews.Content: I ordered on the 14th from USA and received in the Netherlands on the 27th. Took time but I'm happy it showed up brand new and in perfect condition :D.

Reviews.Title: Fab!
Reviews.Author: Heathcliff J. Miller
Reviews.Content: The product arrived late but I have enjoyed it ever since then. I am new to apple/Mac so I am getting accustomed to al, that it can do.I travel alot, so this small device helps considerably with space and weight, still allowing me to surf the net and chat with folks regularly online.Hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: One Nice Deal !
Reviews.Author: HoneyG
Reviews.Content: Placed my order and in Two days I received my iPad2 and after that all was well with me and my iPad2. No complaints the Order went well and I love my iPad2 !!!George

Reviews.Title: Non tech person review
Reviews.Author: Nontech44
Reviews.Content: Not being a techno-whiz, I need all the cue cards I can get. No cue cards w/ the iPad (original). No instruction book. Even w/ tutorials, lots of info re how to download ($),but no basics like how to access and play the music you have downloaded. Took LOTS of trial and error to figure out.On the up side, having a store nearby to take 1:1 classes is wonderful, and will learn much in short order.One other concern, I downloaded Sketchbook Pro to learn to draw in the computer. Present iPad technology requires a stylus pen w/ an eraser tip for iPad to "read" the marks you make. Any way to make a different type of interface sensitivity (pressure  vs electrical charge of skin) to enable a finer tip as needed? Yes, one can choose tips and brushes, but requiring so much surface of the eraser tip to create a line seems inefficient. Perhaps a wacom tablet would have been a better choice.Overall, it is amazing to have music, mail, drawing, search, calendar etc in such a small package.  The problems...no doubt more my abilities than the product.

Reviews.Title: The new personal computer
Reviews.Author: Andrew Peleikis "pillowcase1"
Reviews.Content: For years I had carried around a Newton Messagepad 2100; which was the most amazing portable touch screen device until the iPhone dropped in on the scene. But still the iPhone didn't really carry along the legacy of a useful, tablet computer that the Newton had hinted at back in 1997.As soon as I took my new iPad out of the box, I got the picture that there is something to this device that is more than a sum of its parts. After a few months; I keep saying this is the new personal computer. It will be laptops and desktops for work, and devices like the iPad for the rest of life. As it is, the iPad is almost that device - Its much more than I expected.I have zero gripes with the hardware. None. Its the most perfect piece of hardware I've ever used. The battery lasts forever, the screen is amazing (amazing!) - the smart cover is genius.Now that tethering with my iPhone works over bluetooth, portable internet is handled. Netflix, even facetime on the go is seamless.ANyhow I could go on. Its no replacement for a "computer" but does everything else right.I forgive you, Steve Jobs, for killing the Newton.Newton is dead. Long live iPad.

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet Out There!
Reviews.Author: Jordan Maes

Reviews.Title: I pad 2
Reviews.Author: Turki .A. Basri
Reviews.Content: It's a great gadget. Very easy to use, even my 1 n 1/2  years doughter can use it, not kidding. The only three downsides I see  are the camera (very bad resolution), the flash problem and some of the apps are really expinsive.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 is so sweet.
Reviews.Author: RichieRich
Reviews.Content: iPad 2 makes reading fun again. This is a must-have product. Simplifies my life while making news, education, books, and lifestyle easily accessible.

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: MK
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this purchase!  The shipping wasn't fast, but I requested super saver shipping.  I love using it!  I has almost totally replaced my computer!  It is incredibly easy to use.

Reviews.Title: iGod
Reviews.Author: Thinkman "SmartEnoughToKnowBetter"
Reviews.Content: I have difficulty with my arms, but my finger dexterity is still pretty good. There are so many features of the iPad 2 that make this one of the most indispensable devices in my life. Many of the apps are out-of-this-world amazing, while others simply allow you to be as productive as possible. When you consider the evolution of this product in such a short time, one can only wonder what the future holds. I'm excited and very optimistic!

Reviews.Title: Doesn't have Retina Display, and if you have an iPhone or iPod, then you probably don't need it
Reviews.Author: Amazonadicto "John"
Reviews.Content: I have an iPhone 4 with retina display, and I supposed (my bad) the iPad2 had it as well, I was wrong. The display is not as good as the iPhone 4, however it is a decent display.Also, if you have an iPhone or an iPod Touch, then you probably don't need it.The apps are great, every day you have more and more amazing apps.Also, if you are considering to buy one, try to wait for March or April 2012 for the iPad 3.Thank you!

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD!
Reviews.Author: Koshka
Reviews.Content: THIS ITEM WAS EXCEPTIONAL AND ARRIVED EFFICIENTLY AND WELL PACKAGED. I WAS PLEASANTLY SURPRISED AND SINCE IT WAS A GIFT FOR SOMEONE, I REALLY APPRECIATED HOW WELL THE PRODUCT WAS AND MORE THAN MET MY EXPECTATIONS.

Reviews.Title: Buggy operating system
Reviews.Author: Thomas C Lofgren
Reviews.Content: Looks pretty and functions for my intended use (reading music), but completely useless as a replacement laptop.  The apps are not designed to work with an external keyboard (so you'd still have to scroll with the touchscreen instead of page up/down on the external keyboard), and about 75% of the time, bluetooth sync just locks up to the point that I have to hard reboot it (and even then, it usually doesn't work).  I wish I had bought an Android tablet.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Diana Poore
Reviews.Content: It was really nice to get such a nice used item.  It was slightly used and not all that much cheaper than new but it was cheaper and it included a nice case.  It was just as described, in original box and all.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: REALLY GREAT iPAD!
Reviews.Author: david1827
Reviews.Content: This is so much fun and really does it all! I am very happy I finally got one. Would make a great gift for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Not that great
Reviews.Author: Logan
Reviews.Content: This tablet may have pretty good graphics but there are a lot of faults with it to. Like both cameras really aren't that good really Apple a $400 tablet with only 0.7 mp front and back camera. Not to mention there's no micro sad card slot wich i know none of apples devices have but still they should add it in to them a lot of people wind up needing more space. And why was Siri not added in it was out before this tablet was and it was put in the iPhone 4. People who actually read this review before you buy it ur better off getting a galaxy tab 3 lite it's a lot cheaper then this. its graphics are equal if not better and it has a 2mp camera a whole lot better than this one it alson has a micro sd card slot up to 32 gigs of memory.

Reviews.Title: Ipad from seller Susan Hill
Reviews.Author: Martha Maxwell
Reviews.Content: This is a piece of trash.  BEWARE of buying used items.  The Ipad was to have been received by Feb 28th.  It was not mailed from Ohio until March 7th and received March 12th.  The case and screen hare held together with a piece of plastic tape.  There are three cracks in the screen.  There is no charger included.  I am out almost $250.00 for someone's garbage.  There should be some type of recourse for a buyer in cases of this type,  I guess I could try Judge Judy.

Reviews.Title: Lemon
Reviews.Author: RONALD FARRUGGIA
Reviews.Content: Constant issues with charging. Left several messages with seller, with no response. Have to play with cord and sometimes it charges, sometimes it don't. Not happy.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Cliff Lohner
Reviews.Content: What can I say.  Its an Ipad.  Had no issues with it and its still working perfectly.  I previously had a 16 gb but it didn't have enough memory so I got the 64 gb.  I currently have I think around 6000 songs and 22 movies on there and I still have like 20 gb free...  Good buy...

Reviews.Title: iPad 2
Reviews.Author: Dina Marquez
Reviews.Content: My husband received it and really liked it.  The images are clear and it navigates fast.  Highly recommend it.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great IPAD 2- Very happy with it
Reviews.Author: Daniel Schulaner
Reviews.Content: Even though It's an older IPAD, IPAD 2 has everything you need, to get the job done, and with the 64 GB of storage, you can't beat that.

Reviews.Title: Works fine except WiFi range limited
Reviews.Author: Marvin Bonner
Reviews.Content: Tablet was delivered on time... good condition with only a slight scratch on screen. Tablet works fine except the WiFi range seems to be limited. Will only connect with my router up to about 25 ft. Other devices in my house seem to connect several rooms away. Will probably have to return the ipad if I can't solve the WiFi issue. Would have rated 4 stars except for WiFi range.

Reviews.Title: Beware of iPad Shop
Reviews.Author: D. R. Stanley
Reviews.Content: My wife bought a supposedly new iPad 2 via Amazon which was supplied by the iPad Shop.  When I tried to register it Apple said it was out of warranty.  Long story short, this iPad ended up being a replacement for another unit sold by he iPad Shop back in 2011.  They received a replacement from Apple and sold it to my wife as new in September 2013.  While it might have been new it was recorded by Apple as a replacement to the original owner and thus received the warranty only at the time of return -- which by 2013 had long since expired.  Further, the serial number on the box did not match the serial number on the iPad.  After a back and forth with Apple customer service I finally ascertained that this was a replacement iPad intended for someone else and sold as new by the iPad Shop.  Apple's serial number tracking confirmed this.  It might have been a new unit but Apple changes the serial number on units they replace and would not warranty it beyond the "original purchase date".  Bottom line:  Go directly to Apple for their equipment.  That said, I'm not real pleased with Apple for failing to warranty an obviously new unit just because they assigned a new serial number to a customer who never received it.  I returned the iPad and bought another directly from Apple -- I'm not sure why.  Basically, I'm not pleased with either Apple or the iPad Shop.  But I am pleased with Amazon who noted that there have been similar complaints from this vendor and quickly refunded the purchase price.  Just beware of the iPad Shop.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Margaret Rhodes
Reviews.Content: The touchscreen doesn't work at all.  I will have to return it.  It was a Very disappointing birthday gift for my husband - I will have to send it back.

Reviews.Title: A Simple Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Viv
Reviews.Content: About two years ago, my now husband gave me an Ipad 2 for my birthday and it has been great. For easy access to your email, reading, downloading photos, working in the kitchen, quick searches, you name it, I go to my Ipad. So, this year, brainstorming about a nice, affordable gift for my husband who was going away on a trip to celebrate, the Ipad came up as a great choice. It allows him to do everything he would have to do on his computer while away, but on a much practical, easy to carry around, cool gadget.

Reviews.Title: Travel computer :)
Reviews.Author: Rachelle Pettit
Reviews.Content: I travel a lot and bought this to keep up with my business and website while I'm away. I was not only able to purchase what I needed for an upcoming wedding for a client, but also did my online backing as well. I haven't found much that can't be done with an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Heavily flawed design.
Reviews.Author: MMSahler
Reviews.Content: Had this thing for a couple weeks now and it's essentially a glorified gameboy.The camera is total garbage- I mean my 1995 webcam was higher resolution. The speaker is on the rear of the ipad (why?!) making the poor audio quality and volume even worse. I have sensitive eyes and the brightness does not go nearly low enough to use comfortably in a dark room at night. The volume buttons don't adjust to when the ipad is rotated so I am constantly changing it in the wrong direction. The web access is dodgy even though my router is in my room and there's no signal issue. iOS is very lacking, notifications are tedious to turn off, ad block doesn't do bleep...Battery life is pretty much the only thing decent about this. Screen resolution is just OK. I honestly think this is worth about $50-100 at most. $400 can buy a much more versatile and powerful netbook.

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: The Ipad came exactly has it was posted.  I would recommend this product to everyone that was interested in buying one.

Reviews.Title: It serves my needs.
Reviews.Author: Peapodpixi

Reviews.Title: Love love love
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: I am attached to my I pad like a  barnacle! I never put it down! My whole life is run using my iPad ! I work, play and socialize on this thing every day! THE BEST PURCHASE EVER!

Reviews.Title: Generic box
Reviews.Author: TBS
Reviews.Content: This item arrived in a generic box that was not the original packaging. This item was purchased as new but appeared to have been shipped to be in just a generic box not the original apple packaging. The item did not appear to be new or in original package.

Reviews.Title: The thing that converted me to Apple products once and for all
Reviews.Author: Fryersoncaptain
Reviews.Content: I've always been a bit eclectic in terms of the hardware and software of my various electronic devices. I have a laptop running Ubuntu, a 2008 iMac desktop (I got it as a birthday present mere weeks before the '09 model debuted), I've used many Android devices (two phones and a tablet), and the only e-book reader I've ever used is a Kindle.That having been said, after using the iPad, I'm completely won over to Apple. The build quality is superior to other products, the interface is smooth and responsive, and the software library (as is well known at this point) is incomparably large.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: charlotte
Reviews.Content: I can't rate the ipad yet because it came without a power cord so it is basically unusable.  But when I let Amazon know of my problem I received (as always) excellant customer service from Rajasekhar.  I work in customer service industry myself & know what good customer service is.  I am always pleased with Amazon service.  I am sure once I get a power cord I will like my ipad 2 very much.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished, but had a faulty docking port.
Reviews.Author: Roberta A. Thornton
Reviews.Content: The item came looking like new, but I soon realized the sound would shut off and had to be repaired.

Reviews.Title: iPad 2 - It is a find tablet, but is it for you?
Reviews.Author: Kat
Reviews.Content: I will be the first to admit - I am an android lover (it is such a cute little robot).  More importantly, I am also a techie, so it was inevitable that curiosity would eventually kill the cat (cat being the product loyalty).  When I decided that I wanted to see if iPads live up to the hype, I didn't want to go all out - I wasn't going to purchase a plan from a phone company that will overcharge me for limited data use - especially not when I can tether devices to my phone!  I also wasn't going to pay at least $100 more to get a retina display since I view it as unnecessary for me- certainly not worth the extra money (even if I do have an instinct to have the latest and greatest). I decided that the iPad2 16GB would be appropriate to base my decision!The iPad is a good looking piece of hardware - but I would say that the software left me feeling limited in what I was able to do.Pros:-It's pretty - I do love a good looking piece of technology, and in that, the iPad does not disappoint-I like the multitouch gesturesCons:-Heavy if you are reading in bed-Edges around the screen mean that I have to stretch my thumbs that much further if I am trying to hold and manipulate the device with both hands (you can always cradle it in one arm and manipulate with the other, but it just feels odd no matter how you do it)-No expandable memory - there are very few android tablets that do not offer this- get with the program apple-the App Store was not user friendly and was stubborn when connectivity wasn't fast-I find the settings app to be all over the place - settings for a single app may be in three different places (wouldn't it be nice to get into an individual app's settings from within that app)Overall, if you are looking for something simple to use and don't want to be able to do anything too indepth the iPad is a perfectly adequate choice.  iOS is very straight forward, and generally user friendly as long as you don't want to change settings for them (ie you want to use default settings)- otherwise, you may have to go on a hunt for the exact setting you are looking for (if it even exists).  I have no plan to get rid of my iPad - it works in a pinch and if I am doing something that may be hazardous to my technology, I would bring my iPad, but ultimately, I still prefer my android tablets!

Reviews.Title: FLASH-the IPad is a nuisance!
Reviews.Author: James S. Kelley "bogwood"
Reviews.Content: I have had the 5.1 for almost a year.  The lack of flash/adobe is now driving me to google.  The device is OK but too many of the websites I visit use flash player.  The workarounds are also a nuisance.  There will probably be frustrations with the google device but I have had it with Apple.

Reviews.Title: It's a cool product for me!
Reviews.Author: Poohbear
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd Apple product I've ever owned.  The first one being the littlest Ipod from years ago.  I'm pretty impressed by it, along with my lil daughter, when she saw it being charged, she screamed "Ipad!!!"  lol.  The only thing that bummed me out was when it came with no battery life at all.  I had to charge it while getting the Ipad2 all set up, needless to say, it was stuck to the charger for couple of hours, while I downloaded free apps. I did notice it immediately registered Verizon, but I have AT&T; wireless internet at home and this was meant to be just Wifi only.  And not for long, it started asking if I want to add more data now or later before I can proceed with browsing.  That was an easy fix and I was able to modify it to just Wifi only. It then asked for IOS6 update while in the midst of downloading apps.  And after that, it was just smooth sailing and I made sure to enable some restrictions so my 4 yr old won't be buying any in-apps accidentally.  Read too much horror stories on that.  I did tell her to never click on the word "buy" because that would mean, it will take money away from Mommy!  LOL  Overall, quite happy with my big purchase.  I know this ain't the newest Ipad model but to me, it's good enough!And I am as pleased with the case and the screen protector I bought here in Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Myreview

Reviews.Content: The best investment I did in purchasing IPad 2. This is great for easy access to internet and program of value various apps I uses.

Reviews.Content: We enjoy this IPad 2 and so do our grandchildren..We have to hide it from them to get to use it ourselves..

Reviews.Title: Very fast delivery!!
Reviews.Author: IPad 2 Received!!
Reviews.Content: So excited!! I ordered the IPad 2 on Tuesday afternoon and it was received in my office on Friday morning!! So not expected. The product was packaged wonderfully and ready for use. There were no scratches or dents...nothing on it that I would be surprised of. Thank you for such a quick delivery. This will definitely give me time to familiarize myself prior to the start of my hiring season in the next couple of weeks!The iPad is in wonderful condition. I am so glad that I ordered the Verizon version. The data package deals are not too bad and can be purchased directly from the iPad. The apps are super fun and the apps that I will use for my kids are not that expensive, between 2 and 5 dollars. A note to self would be that IBM Lotus notes is not immediately compatible with Mac. The installation looks as if it happens, but the id name does not install. There are Youtube videos with instructions, but I am not the most computer savvy so I do not necessary understand the instructions. Microsoft office works well and all other programs that I have installed.Have a wonderful day!
